text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Wah wah! You are already responsible for the lost lives that could have been saved by prompt action to combat the coronavirus. You and your den of idiots must be held accountable for endangering those people encouraged by your irresponsible tweets. https://t.co/l7IiZNYcfk
